name: 梁一帆
wishText: May the love and happiness always be with you! :)
text1: It's your birthday!!! 生日快乐 :D
textInChatBox: 生日快乐🎉🎂🎁!!! 希望你天天开心，能够自由自在、无拘无束的做你自己～ 也希望你大事儿小事儿、开心事不开心事能够说出来，有事儿随时吱声儿，包随叫随到！
text4: Wait! I wanted to do something
text5Content: You've been my friend for a long long time.
replayText: Okay, now click if you want to watch it again.
